    • Method Detail

      • getUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getUsers(User admin)
                              throws InvalidAdministratorException
        Returns all users in the database
        Parameters:
        admin - User with authLevel = 2
        Returns:
        List of User objects
        Throws:
        InvalidAdministratorException - Throws if admin is not a valid administrator in the database

      • getUsersById

        public java.util.List<User> getUsersById(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        Get all Users in database with ids in list
        Parameters:
        list - list of Integers to grab Users by
        Returns:
        list of Users in the server

      • getUser

        public User getUser(int id)
             throws InvalidUserException
        Returns a user based on the inputed id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the User desired
        Returns:
        User with ID id
        Throws:
        InvalidUserException - Throws if User with id id does not exist in the database

      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation(User u)
        Returns the Location data of a given user
        Parameters:
        u - Desired User with Location data
        Returns:
        Location data of u

      • addUser

        public java.lang.String addUser(User toAdd,
                                User admin)
                         throws InvalidUserException,
                                InvalidAdministratorException
        Adds a User to the database
        Parameters:
        toAdd - User to add
        admin - User to authorize adding User's with authLevel greater than 0
        Returns:
        String if successful
        Throws:
        InvalidUserException - Throws if toAdd is null, or if username already exists in database
        InvalidAdministratorException - Throws if admin is invalid

      • updateUserInfo

        public java.lang.String updateUserInfo(User toUpdate,
                                       User updateTo,
                                       User admin)
                                throws InvalidUserException,
                                       InvalidAdministratorException
        Updates a User based on the information in updateTo
        Parameters:
        toUpdate - User to update
        updateTo - User containing info updating to
        admin - User used to authorize increasing authority level of toUpdate
        Returns:
        String stating success, or why updating did not work
        Throws:
        InvalidUserException - Throws if toAdd is null, or if username already exists in database
        InvalidAdministratorException - Throws if admin is invalid

      • deleteUser

        public java.lang.String deleteUser(User delete,
                                   User admin)
                            throws InvalidUserException,
                                   InvalidAdministratorException
        Throws:
        InvalidUserException
        InvalidAdministratorException
